knimeNode.name: Trend Line Cropper
knimeNode.shortDescription: Crops out a region following the trendling. Use the left and right margin to specify how many pixels left and right of the trendline will be removed. Due to the nature of trend lines, parameters for starting row and ending row are also provided.
